ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: with a barrier between them they do not break through.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: With an interstice between them which they cannot cross.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and yet there is a barrier between them which they may not overstep.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: but has created a barrier between them so that they will not merge totally.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Whereas there is a barrier between them so they cannot encroach upon one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Between them is a barrier which none of them can transgress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Between them is a barrier which they cannot pass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: between them a barrier they do not overpass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There is a barrier between them. They encroach not (one upon the other).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Between them is a barrier, which they do not overrun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In-between the twain is a barrier which they pass not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is a barrier between them, which they do not overstep.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Between them is a Barrier which they do not transgress:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Between them is a barrier which none of them can transgress.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and between them is a barrier which they do not overpass.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Between them is a barrier, which they do not overrun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:20] Between them there is a barrier, by His power, exalted be He. They do not overstep, neither of the two encroaches upon the other to become mixed with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There is a barrier) from Allah (between them) between the sweet and salty seas. (They encroach not (one upon the other)) nor does any one of them change the taste of the other.
